q_en: I have completed all the workload for the sewing task with ID 34. Please update the completed quantity.

steps.sql: UPDATE sewing_tasks SET completed_number = planned_number WHERE id = 34;
steps.description: Update the completed number for the sewing task with ID 34 to match the planned number, indicating that the task is fully completed.
